abstract: A bootiful championship round grid from the Westchester Crossword Puzzle Tournament by Kurt Mueller.
snippet: A bootiful championship round grid from the Westchester Crossword Puzzle Tournament by Kurt Mueller.
lead_paragraph: THURSDAY'S PUZZLE - There's a lot to like in this puzzle, but perhaps my favorite part is that it allowed me to draw little pictures of ghosts inside some of the squares of this rebus. That wasn't a completely original idea. Jeffrey Schwartz, second place winner of the 2011 Westchester Crossword Puzzle Tournament, drew them during the championship round and I thought that was a lot more fun than trying to cram the word GHOST into each square. Congratulations as well to champion Robert Mackey and third place winner Elaine Lippman.

headline.main: Thursday: Visibly Scared Out of One's Wits
